data.comment: Swansea kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Goal! Derby County have got their heads in front thanks to a Kazim strike.
In the minute 4, Lee Buchanan with an assist there.
Kamil Jozwiak puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Martyn Waghorn.
In the minute 45, Yan Dhanda is replacing Kyle Naughton for Swansea at Pride Park Stadium.
Kasey Palmer is on a sub for Jay Fulton for Swansea.
In the minute 46, Derby County kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Ryan Manning is replacing Jake Bidwell for the away team.
Steve Cooper is making the team's fourth substitution at Pride Park Stadium with Jordan Garrick replacing Jamal Lowe.
In the minute 67, At Pride Park Stadium, Andre Ayew has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Derby County make their first substitution with Duane Holmes replacing Martyn Waghorn.
The away team have replaced Korey Smith with Liam Cullen. This is the fifth substitution made today by Steve Cooper.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
The home team replace Kamil Jozwiak with Louie Sibley.
Jack Kirk Stretton is replacing Kazim for the home team.
